pages.title: WebAI ‚Äî Artificial Intelligence for the Web
pages.text: Deploying AI in the BrowserRunning machine learning programs entirely client-side in the browser unlocks new opportunities, like interactive ML! From a user‚Äôs perspective, there‚Äôs no need to install any libraries or drivers : Just open a webpage, and your program is ready to run! On a mobile device, the model can take advantage of sensor data (i.e.: gyroscope or accelerometer). Finally, all data stays on the client, making TensorFlow.js useful for low-latency inference, as well as for privacy preserving applications. Low-Latency Inference and Privacy Preserving Applications The ‚Ä¶ See the Pen Robot Neil‚Äôs Bubble Bath by Tero Parviainen (@teropa) on CodePen. #AI #AIFirst #MontrealAI #MontrealArtificialIntelligence

pages.text: Qu√©bec.AI‚Äôs Chief AI Officers : Powerful Economic Drivers Overarching Focus : World-Class Deep Learning ExpertsTo succeed in many of its endeavors and to be ready for tomorrow, Qu√©bec.AI relies on recruiting, developing and training completion-oriented men and women with the determination to ensure a fully Joint Workforce : Intellectually, operationally, organizationally, doctrinally, and technically. ‚Äú We want to see more widespread matrix interoperability, individual and life-long learning opportunities and development of connoisseurs, high-profile and ultra-affluent Chief AI Officers who possess the knowledges, the skills and the competencies to orchestrate impactful breakthroughs and tangible economic growth for Fortune 500, governments and interagency partners in full compliance with our masterplan : The Qu√©bec AI-First Conglomerate Overarching Program.‚Äú Since top AI talent is extremely scarce right now and consulting the right AI leader can dramatically increases your odds of business success, Qu√©bec.AI specifically develops professional Chief AI Officers dedicated to effectively take advantage of AI and to synergically fulfill its responsibilities with flexibility and responsiveness. ‚úâÔ∏è Email Us : info@chiefaiofficers.com Qu√©bec.AI Atelier : ‚ÄòHaute Couture‚Äô Top AI ModelsThe Qu√©bec.AI Atelier creates and deploys scorching AI deep learning top AI models in the browser from transfer learning combined with reinforcement learning (RL) and good old fashioned machine learning intuition. Our in-house ‚ÄòHaute Couture‚Äô AI designers, with elegance and sophistication, are accountable for the design, deployment and implementation of top AI models which are faster and generalize better. ‚úâÔ∏è Email Us : info@quebec.aiüåê Website : http://www.quebec.ai/ #AI #AIFirst #ChiefAIOfficers #QuebecAI #QuebecArtificialIntelligence
